content: use this tiny crochet backpack keychain as an airpods case a coin purse or to organize any small items you need to carry around it makes a quick and easy stocking stuffer or gift card holder too **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ > please add the pattern to your ravelry favorites
